title: Raster Data Elevation Layer
description: RasterDataElevationLayer is a single-band raster layer used for rendering elevation.

id.description: A unique identifying string for the layer

listMode.description: To show or hide the elevation layer in the layer list

path.description: For offline data, a path to an ArcGIS Runtime supported raster data file. A URI format is used, starting with file: followed by a file system path. A relative path must be from the file which defines the layer. For example `file:../commondata/raster_data/beijing.tif`

title.description: A user-friendly string title for the layer that can be used in a table of contents. If this is not included, a title is derived from the service.

visibility.description: Boolean property determining whether the layer is initially visible in the web scene.
